types.title: Basic Tour
types.information: Includes entrance to 4 main museums in Arequipa (e.g., Museo Santuarios Andinos, Monasterio de Santa Catalina, Museo Arqueológico UNSA, and Museo de la Catedral).
types.benefits: Affordable price, ideal for travelers with limited time. Guided tour in one language (English or Spanish) with essential highlights.

types.title: Medium Tour
types.information: Includes entrance to 6 museums, adding options such as Casa del Moral and Museo de Arte Contemporáneo.
types.benefits: More in-depth experience with extended guided explanations.Complimentary coffee break or local snack during the tour.

types.title: Full Tour
types.information: Includes entrance to all available museums in the program (8–10), covering both the classic and modern art/culture collections.
types.benefits: Full-day tour with bilingual guide and private transportation between museums.Exclusive access to special areas or temporary exhibitions, plus a certificate of participation.
